oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Synthesis of beta-halogenated porphyrin dimers with distinct photophysical properties
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: RAVIKANTH, M
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: basket-handle porphyrins
oligomers
dynamics
hexamer
design
arrays
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Diaryl ethyne bridged zinc and free base porphyrin containing dimers with four bromines exclusively on one of the porphyrin ring have been synthesized. The energy transfer from an excited zinc porphyrin to free base porphyrin depends mainly on the position of bromines in the dimers.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: INDIAN JOURNAL OF CHEMISTRY SECTION A-INORGANIC BIO-INORGANIC PHYSICAL THEORETICAL & ANALYTICAL CHEMISTRY, 39(9), 980-982
